short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Inshot for PC, Windows, and Mac extension to bring an amazing video editor with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use Inshot Video Editing on your PC windows and Mac with our simple  easy-to-use Extension. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, editing videos has never been this straightforward.

Using this Inshot Extension you can easily edit your videos and save them on high resolution. You can enjoy the simplicity and editing features on your web browser. 

Inshot Features:

-Video Editing
-Filters and Effects
-Text and Stickers
-Music and Sound Effects
-Transition Effects
-Adjustments
-Speed Control
-Rotate and Flip
-Easy Sharing
-In-app Camera

How to Use:
Step 1: First you need to add our Inshot for PC, Windows and Mac Extension on your chrome browser.
Step 2: Just Click on the extension and you can see the Inshot Video editing extension.
Step 3: Now you need to click the + icon and add your Video. You can also drag and drop your video from your PC.
Step 4: You can use options like Split, Duplicate, and Delete video from the timeline.   In the "File" menu, you can save and export the edited video.
That's it.

Inshot Video Editor is your straightforward solution for hassle-free video editing. With this extension, you can easily access Inshot's features from your web browser. Whether your are a beginner or Pro Video Editor this extension helps to edit your video more attractive.



Disclaimer:
Please note that "Inshot for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Inshot Android app or its developers.
